code: function executeSkill(context) { const sourcePiece = context.piece; const damage = context.damage || 0; const healAmount = Math.floor(damage * 0.5); if (healAmount > 0 && sourcePiece.currentHp < sourcePiece.maxHp) { const healResult = healDamage(sourcePiece, sourcePiece, healAmount, context.battle, context.skill.id); return { message: sourcePiece.name + 'é€šè¿‡æ”¶å‰²æ¢å¤äº†' + healResult.heal + 'ç‚¹ç”Ÿå‘½å€¼', success: true }; } return { message: '', success: true }; }
